  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static Service getInstance()

    • addClient

      public void addClient(String idString, String name, String address, String email, String ageString) throws ServiceException
      Adds a new client to the system.
      Parameters:
      idString - the identifier of the client to be added, as a string
      name - the name of the client
      address - the address of the client
      email - the email of the client
      ageString - the age of the client, as a string
      Throws:
      ServiceException - if any of the parameters is null or if the identifier is not a number or already exists in the system

    • updateClient

      public void updateClient(String idString, String name, String address, String email, String ageString) throws ServiceException
      Updates the information of an existing client in the system.
      Parameters:
      idString - the identifier of the client to be updated, as a string
      name - the new name of the client, or null if it should not be updated
      address - the new address of the client, or null if it should not be updated
      email - the new email of the client, or null if it should not be updated
      ageString - the new age of the client, as a string, or null if it should not be updated
      Throws:
      ServiceException - if the identifier is null or not a number, or if no client with the given identifier is found

    • deleteClient

      public void deleteClient(String idString) throws ServiceException
      Deletes a client from the system.
      Parameters:
      idString - the identifier of the client to be deleted, as a string
      Throws:
      ServiceException - if the identifier is null or not a number, or if no client with the given identifier is found

    • addProduct

      public void addProduct(String idString, String name, String quantityString, String priceString) throws ServiceException
      Adds a new product to the system.
      Parameters:
      idString - the identifier of the product to be added, as a string
      name - the name of the product
      quantityString - the quantity of the product, as a string
      priceString - the price of the product, as a string
      Throws:
      ServiceException - if any of the parameters is null or if the identifier is not a number or already exists in the system

    • updateProduct

      public void updateProduct(String idString, String name, String quantityString, String priceString) throws ServiceException
      Updates the information of an existing product in the system.
      Parameters:
      idString - the identifier of the product to be updated, as a string
      name - the new name of the product, or null if it should not be updated
      quantityString - the new quantity of the product, as a string, or null if it should not be updated
      priceString - the new price of the product, as a string, or null if it should not be updated
      Throws:
      ServiceException - if the identifier is null or not a number, or if no product with the given identifier is found

    • deleteProduct

      public void deleteProduct(String idString) throws ServiceException
      Deletes a product from the system.
      Parameters:
      idString - the identifier of the product to be deleted, as a string
      Throws:
      ServiceException - if the identifier is null or not a number, or if no product with the given identifier is found

    • addOrder

      public void addOrder(String orderIdString, String clientIdString, String productIdString, String quantityString) throws ServiceException
      Adds a new order to the database.
      Parameters:
      orderIdString - The ID of the order as a string.
      clientIdString - The ID of the client who placed the order as a string.
      productIdString - The ID of the product ordered as a string.
      quantityString - The quantity of the product ordered as a string.
      Throws:
      ServiceException - If any of the input strings are empty or null, or if the input identifiers are not numbers, or if the client or product does not exist in the database, or if the order ID is not unique, or if there is insufficient stock for the product ordered.

    • deleteOrder

      public void deleteOrder(String idString) throws ServiceException
      Deletes an order from the database by ID.
      Parameters:
      idString - The ID of the order to delete as a string.
      Throws:
      ServiceException - If the input string is empty or null, or if the input identifier is not a number, or if the order does not exist in the database.

    • addBill

      public void addBill(int id, int orderId, int clientId, double total, LocalDateTime date)
      Adds a new bill to the database.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the bill.
      orderId - The ID of the order that the bill corresponds to.
      clientId - The ID of the client who placed the order.
      total - The total amount of the bill.
      date - The date and time when the bill was created.
